subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson holed out from the eighth fairway for eagle and chipped in for birdie on the 16th, carrying him to a one-under 70 and a one-shot lead over Pat Perez in the Northern Trust Open in Los Angeles.
snippet: Phil Mickelson holed out from the eighth fairway for eagle and chipped in for birdie on the 16th, carrying him to a one-under 70 and a one-shot lead over Pat Perez in the Northern Trust Open in Los Angeles.
